Package com.esprit.controllers.series

Class CategoriesClientController

java.lang.Object
com.esprit.controllers.series.CategoriesClientController
public class CategoriesClientController extends Object
Is responsible for handling user interactions related to categories, such as displaying category information and handling menu events. The controller uses an `IServiceCategorieImpl` interface to retrieve category data from a database and displays the information in a tile pane. Additionally, it handles menu events for different types of content (series, episodes) and displays them in separate stages.

    • afficher

      public void afficher()
      Clears the children of a `tilepane`, retrieves a list of categories from an `IServiceCategorieImpl`, loops through the list and adds a `VBox` for each category, displaying its name and description.

    • Ocategories

      void Ocategories(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Loads a FXML file named "CategorieClient.fxml", creates a scene with the root node, sets the scene on a stage, and displays the stage.
      Parameters:
      event - event that triggered the function, specifically the opening of a JavaFX application. - `event`: An `ActionEvent` object representing the user's action that triggered the function execution.
      Throws:
      IOException
